title: after Android 11 Update, Pixel 4 XL is not connection to mobile network
content:
Today, I updated my Pixel 4XL to Android 11, after receiving a notification.
After the update, my mobile has not network service.
I am able to connect to wifi.

I have tried the below steps
1. removing and reinserting the sim
2. switching on and off from aeroplane mode
3. reset the Network Settings (Bluetooth, mobile and wifi)
4. Factory reset: erase all the data.
5. I switched the sim and my wife sim also did not work, and my sim worked perfectly in her phone. (So, no issues with the sim)
Neither of these options worked for me.

How can I fix it?
Will I have to wait for a patch again?
My phone is totally useless right now.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
